body: Hi @AntAndfish , thanks and you should change both version 2.0.2 and dev directory in https://github.com/apache/dolphinscheduler-website/tree/master/docs. Please remember you should change both zh an en version here.
For example, you should change https://github.com/apache/dolphinscheduler-website/blob/master/docs/en-us/2.0.2/user_doc/guide/task/sub-process.md for version 2.0.2 version
I assigned it to you, looking forward your contribution.

dolphinScheduler on k8s by using helm
a shell script failed to run
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/36130371/150906209-f2b786ed-3451-4e35-8144-3d180d735fe1.png)


curl: command not found
jq: command not found

it can work normally

### How to reproduce

dolphinscheduler on k8s by helm
create a shell type job
shell script is following
```
#!/bin/sh
for i in `cat course_data/jm_ip.txt`
do 
echo ======$i======;
jobname_repeated=$(curl -s http://$i/v1/jobs/overview| jq '.jobs[]|select(.state=="RUNNNING")|.name'|uniq -d)
echo jobname_repeated:$jobname_repeated;
if [ -n "$jobname_repeated" ]
then
    echo "flink jobname is repeated"
    if [[ ${i} =~ 'dev' || ${i} =~ 'test' ]]
    then
        curl -d '{"title": "FLink任务名称重复告警", "url": "'"http://$i"'","message": "'"$jobname_repeated"'" , "state": "Firing"}' -H 'Content-Type: application/json' "http://course-test.inner.youdao.com/ops/alarm?origin=default&profile=dev&group=FlinkJobNameMonitor&phone=false"
    else
        curl -d '{"title": "FLink任务名称重复告警", "url": "'"http://$i"'", "message": "'"$jobname_repeated"'" , "state": "Firing"}' -H 'Content-Type: application/json' "http://course.inner.youdao.com/ops/alarm?origin=default&profile=prod&group=FlinkJobNameMonitor&phone=false"   
    fi
else
    echo "flink jobname is normal"
fi
done

```
